column3: Traffic;Koh Kong:------ Four people were killed following a traffic accident at an intersection on National Road 48 in Botum Sakor on the afternoon of December 2.. Three died instantly and the fourth on the way to hospital.------Both vehicles were trucks of a medium and large size
column4: the source said. All four of the dead were passengers in a private company ;Getwell Life Science’ truck
column5: while the driver of the large truck was unharmed.------The authorities are investigating the identities of the victim and documenting the cause of the incident. ------NKD
